XML_TEMPLATES.template:
<RichTextEditor
	id=""
	models=""
	bindingContexts=""
	objectBindings=""
	Type=""
	busy="false"
	busyIndicatorDelay="1000"
	visible="true"
	fieldGroupIds="[]"
	value=""
	textDirection="Inherit"
	width=""
	height=""
	editorType="TinyMCE"
	editorLocation="js/tiny_mce/tiny_mce_src.js"
	editable="true"
	showGroupFontStyle="true"
	showGroupTextAlign="true"
	showGroupStructure="true"
	showGroupFont="false"
	showGroupClipboard="true"
	showGroupInsert="false"
	showGroupLink="false"
	showGroupUndo="false"
	wrapping="true"
	required="false"
	sanitizeValue="true"
	plugins="[]"
	useLegacyTheme="true"
	buttonGroups="[]"
	validationSuccess=""
	validationError=""
	parseError=""
	formatError=""
	modelContextChange=""
	validateFieldGroup=""
	change=""
	ready=""
	beforeEditorInit="">
	<tooltip></tooltip><!-- sap.ui.core.TooltipBase -->
	<customData></customData><!-- sap.ui.core.CustomData -->
	<layoutData></layoutData><!-- sap.ui.core.LayoutData -->
	<dependents></dependents><!-- sap.ui.core.Element -->
</RichTextEditor>
XML_TEMPLATES.name: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor
XML_TEMPLATES.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new RichTextEditor. The RichTextEditor uses a third party component, which might in some cases not be completely compatible with the way UI5's (re-)rendering mechanism works. If you keep hidden instances of the control (instances which are not visible in the DOM), you might run into problems with some browser versions. In this case please make sure you destroy the RichTextEditor instance instead of hiding it and create a new one when you show it again. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object. The supported settings are:
  • Properties
    • {@link #getValue value} : string (default: )
    • {@link #getTextDirection textDirection} : sap.ui.core.TextDirection (default: Inherit)
    • {@link #getWidth width} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize
    • {@link #getHeight height} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize
    • {@link #getEditorType editorType} : string (default: TinyMCE)
    • {@link #getEditorLocation editorLocation} : string (default: js/tiny_mce/tiny_mce_src.js)
    • {@link #getEditable editable} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowGroupFontStyle showGroupFontStyle} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowGroupTextAlign showGroupTextAlign} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowGroupStructure showGroupStructure} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowGroupFont showGroupFont} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowGroupClipboard showGroupClipboard} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getShowGroupInsert showGroupInsert} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowGroupLink showGroupLink} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getShowGroupUndo showGroupUndo} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getWrapping wrapping} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getRequired required} : boolean (default: false)
    • {@link #getSanitizeValue sanitizeValue} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getPlugins plugins} : object[] (default: [])
    • {@link #getUseLegacyTheme useLegacyTheme} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getButtonGroups buttonGroups} : object[] (default: [])
  • Events
    • {@link #event:change change} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:ready ready} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:beforeEditorInit beforeEditorInit} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.
XML_TEMPLATES.helpDescription: The RichTextEditor-Control is used to enter formatted text.
